answers.answer: I would go in just to be safe. Hope you feel better.
I would call your doctor! Mine always asks if I have fevers or chills.. I think its a sign of preeclampsia but I'm not sure. Good luck :)

question: I've been sick with cold like symptoms for the past 3 days and had a little fever yesterday but today I feel extremely weak and tired, hot, headache, and feel like my face is melting off. I've been keeping hydrated with just water and my urine is orange.
title: 33 weeks fever and chills should I go to er?
